section.heading: Interpretation of fees.
section.text: No inference shall be drawn, or precedent established, based on the provisions in § 32-1308 or § 32-1308.01 that provide that attorney fees shall be calculated pursuant to the matrix approved in Salazar v. District of Columbia, 123 F.Supp.2d 8 (D.D.C. 2000) that such fees are reasonable for any law other than this chapter, the Minimum Wage Revision Act, the Sick and Safe Leave Act, or the Living Wage Act.
